title: 07/07/21 DPS Best of
itunes:title: 07/07/21 DPS Best of
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan Patrick, react to Game 1 of the NBA Finals and discuss the impression Giannis Antetokounmpo left in his first game back from injury. Shohei Ohtani or Fernando Tatis Jr., who would you rather start an MLB franchise with? Yahoo Sports NBA Writer Vince Goodwill joins the guys to discuss the NBA Finals and debate if the Suns are deserving of this year's title given the path they've been on to get here.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
